get.summary: Retrieves all the available operations in a provider.
Retrieves all the managers in a subscription.
Retrieves all the managers in a resource group.
Returns the properties of the specified manager name.
Retrieves all the access control records in a manager.
Returns the properties of the specified access control record name.

parameters.name: accessControlRecordName
parameters.description: Name of access control record to be fetched.

put.summary: Create or Updates an access control record.

parameters.name: accessControlRecordName
parameters.description: The name of the access control record.

parameters.name: accessControlRecord
parameters.description: The access control record to be added or updated.

parameters.name: accessControlRecordName
parameters.description: The name of the access control record to delete.

get.summary: Retrieves all the alerts in a manager.
Retrieves all the backups in a manager.
Retrieves all the devices in a manager.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Specify $expand=details to populate additional fields related to the device.

get.summary: Returns the properties of the specified device name.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Specify $expand=details to populate additional fields related to the device.

get.summary: Returns the alert settings of the specified device name.

put.summary: Creates or updates the alert settings

get.summary: Retrieves all the backups in a device. Can we used to get the backups for failover also.

parameters.name: forFailover
parameters.description: Set to true if you need backups which can be used for failover.

post.summary: Clones the given backup element to a new disk or share with given details.

get.summary: Retrieves all the backup schedule groups in a device.
Returns the properties of the specified backup schedule group name.

parameters.name: scheduleGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the schedule group.

put.summary: Creates or Updates the backup schedule Group.

parameters.name: scheduleGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the schedule group.

parameters.name: scheduleGroup
parameters.description: The schedule group to be created

parameters.name: scheduleGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the schedule group.

get.summary: Returns the properties of the specified chap name.

parameters.name: chapUserName
parameters.description: The user name of chap to be fetched.

parameters.name: chapSetting
parameters.description: The chap setting to be added or updated.

get.summary: Retrieves all the iscsi disks in a device.

post.summary: Fails over the device to another device.

get.summary: Retrieves all the devices which can be used as failover targets for the given device.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Specify $expand=details to populate additional fields related to the device.

get.summary: Retrieves all the file servers in a device.
Returns the properties of the specified file server name.

put.summary: Creates or updates the file server.

get.summary: Gets the file server metrics.

parameters.name: fileServerName
parameters.description: The name of the file server name.

get.summary: Retrieves metric definitions of all metrics aggregated at the file server.

parameters.name: fileServerName
parameters.description: The name of the file server.

get.summary: Retrieves all the file shares in a file server.
Returns the properties of the specified file share name.

put.summary: Creates or updates the file share.

get.summary: Gets the file share metrics
Retrieves metric definitions of all metrics aggregated at the file share.

post.summary: Installs the updates on the device.

get.summary: Retrieves all the iscsi in a device.
Returns the properties of the specified iscsi server name.

put.summary: Creates or updates the iscsi server.

get.summary: Retrieves all the disks in a iscsi server.
Returns the properties of the specified iscsi disk name.

put.summary: Creates or updates the iscsi disk.

get.summary: Gets the iscsi disk metrics
Retrieves metric definitions for all metric aggregated at the iscsi disk.
Gets the iscsi server metrics
Retrieves metric definitions for all metrics aggregated at iscsi server.
Retrieves all the jobs in a device.
Returns the properties of the specified job name.
Gets the device metrics.
Retrieves metric definition of all metrics aggregated at device.
Returns the network settings of the specified device name.

post.summary: Triggers collection of support package on a device.
Scans for updates on the device.
Creates or updates the security settings.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: The send test alert email request.

get.summary: Retrieves all the file shares in a device.

200.description: List of FileShare objects in a device

Returns the update summary of the specified device name.
Returns the encryption settings of the manager.
Returns the extended information of the specified manager name.

put.summary: Creates the extended info of the manager.

delete.summary: Deletes the extended info of the manager.

patch.summary: Updates the extended info of the manager.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: Pass the ETag of ExtendedInfo fetched from GET call

get.summary: Retrieves all the file servers in a manager.

post.summary: Returns the activation key of the manager.
Returns the encryption key of the manager.

get.summary: Retrieves all the iscsi servers in a manager.
Retrieves all the jobs in a manager.
Gets the  manager metrics
Retrieves metric definition of all metrics aggregated at manager.

post.summary: Re-generates and returns the activation key of the manager.

get.summary: Returns the properties of the specified storage account credential name.

parameters.name: credentialName
parameters.description: The name of storage account credential to be fetched.

put.summary: Creates or updates the storage account credential

parameters.name: storageAccount
parameters.description: The storage account credential to be added or updated.

parameters.name: credentialName
parameters.description: The name of the storage account credential.

get.summary: Retrieves all the storage domains in a manager.
Returns the properties of the specified storage domain name.

put.summary: Creates or updates the storage domain.

AlertFilter.description: Filters that can be specified on the alert

appearedAtTime.description: UTC time at which the alert appeared

appearedAtSourceTime.description: UTC time at which the alert appeared on the source

clearedAtTime.description: UTC time at which the alert got cleared

clearedAtSourceTime.description: UTC time at which the alert was cleared on the source

source.description: source at which the alert was cleared

recommendation.description: Recommendation for acting on the alert

nextLink.description: Id of the next page of alerts

AlertSettings.description: AlertSettings on the device which represents how alerts will be processed

AlertSettingsProperties.description: Class containing the properties for Alertsettings

emailNotification.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether user/admins will receive emails when an alert condition occurs on the system

notificationToServiceOwners.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether service owners will receive emails when an alert condition occurs on the system
            This is applicable only if emailNotification flag is Enabled

alertNotificationCulture.description: Gets or sets the culture setting to be used while building alert emails

additionalRecipientEmailList.description:
List of email addresses (apart from admin/coadmin of subscription) to whom the alert emails need to be sent
            This will be stored in encrypted format for security purposes

AlertSource.description: source at which the alert can be raised

name.description:
Gets or sets the name of the operation being performed on this particular object
            Return value format: "{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{read|write|deletion|action}"
            Eg: Microsoft.StorSimple/managers/devices/fileServers/read
                Microsoft.StorSimple/managers/devices/alerts/clearAlerts/action

display.description:
Gets or sets Display information
            Contains the localized display information for this particular operation/action

origin.description:
Gets or sets Origin
            The intended executor of the operation; governs the display of the operation in the RBAC UX and the audit logs UX.
            Default value is user,system

properties.description:
Gets or sets Properties
            Reserved for future use

AvailableProviderOperationDisplay.description:
Contains the localized display information for this particular operation / action. 
            These value will be used by several clients for 
            (1) custom role definitions for RBAC; 
            (2) complex query filters for the event service; and (3) audit history / records for management operations.

AvailableProviderOperations.description: Class for set of operations used for discovery of available provider operations.

sizeInBytes.description: Gets or sets the size in MB.

endpointName.description: Gets or sets the name of the endpoint.

endpointId.description: Gets or sets the endpoint identifier.

dataPolicy.description: Gets or sets the data policy of backed up endpoint.

targetId.description:
Gets or sets the target id
            The path id of the target FileServer or IscsiServer for which the backup was taken.

sizeInBytes.description:
Gets or sets size in MB
            The backup size in bytes.

createdTime.description:
Gets or sets the created time.
            The time when the backup was created.

expirationTime.description:
Gets or sets the expiration time.
            The time when the backup will expire.

initiatedBy.description:
Gets or sets the initiated by.
            Indicates how the backup was initiated "Manual | Scheduled".

deviceId.description: Gets or sets the Device Identifier.

elements.description: Gets or sets the backup elements.

startTime.description:
Gets or sets the start time.
            When this field is specified we will generate Default GrandFather Father Son Backup Schedules.

BackupScheduleGroups.description: The list response of backup schedule groups

value.description: Gets or sets the chap settings entity collection

password.description: Gets or sets the encrypted password for chap

passwordEncrpyptionCertificateThumbprint.description: Gets or sets the password encryption thumbprint for chap

resolutionMessage.description: resolution message while clearing the request

alerts.description: list of alert Ids to be cleared

properties.description: CloneJob Properties are encapsulated in this object.

targetDeviceId.description: DeviceId of the device which will act as the Clone target

targetAccessPointId.description: Accesspoint Id on which clone job will performed.

newEndpointName.description: Name of new endpoint which will created as part of clone job.

Device.description: Represents a StorSimple device object along with its properties

properties.description: Collection of properties for the device

DeviceDetails.description: Class containing more granular details about the device

endpointCount.description: Total number of endpoints that are currently on the device ( i.e. number of shares on FileServer or number of volumes on IscsiServer)

totalStorageInBytes.description: Total storage available on the device in bytes.

totalLocalStorageInBytes.description: Total local storage capacity in device

provisionedStorageInBytes.description: Storage in bytes that has been provisioned on the device including both local and cloud

provisionedLocalStorageInBytes.description: Storage in bytes that has been provisioned locally on the device

usingStorageInBytes.description: Storage that is being currently used in bytes including both local and cloud

usingLocalStorageInBytes.description: Local Storage that is being currently used in bytes

totalBackupSizeInBytes.description: Total size taken up by backups in bytes

availableStorageInBytes.description: Total pending available storage on the device in bytes

availableLocalStorageInBytes.description: Local pending storage available on the device in bytes

DevicePatch.description:
Class that represents the Input for the PATCH call on Device
            Currently the only patchable property on device is "DeviceDescription"

deviceDescription.description: Short description given for the device

DeviceProperties.description: Encases all the properties of the Device

activationTime.description: The UTC time at which the device was activated

allowedDeviceOperations.description: Operations that are allowed on the device based on its current state

culture.description: Language culture setting on the device

deviceCapabilities.description: Device can be configured either as FileServer or IscsiServer

deviceDescription.description: Short description given for the device

domainName.description: Fully qualified name of the domain to which the device is attached

deviceSoftwareVersion.description: Version number of the software running on the device

friendlySoftwareName.description: Friendly name for the software version

deviceConfigurationStatus.description:
"Complete" if the device has been successfully registered as File/IscsiServer and the creation of share/volume is complete
            "Pending" if the device is only registered but the creation of share/volume is complete is still pending

details.description:
subclass containing more storage-related information about the device
            This field will be populated only if the get call is made with $expand = details

EncryptionKey.description: Model to represent the EncryptionKey for a manager

encryptionAlgorithm.description: Gets or sets the encryption algorithm which was used to encrypt the EncodedPublicKey.

encryptedPublicKey.description: Gets or sets the encrypted public key.

properties.description: properties are encased in this object

EncryptionSettingsProperties.description: Class containing the properties of EncryptionSettings

encryptionStatus.description: Gets or sets the encryption status which indicates if encryption is enabled or not.

keyRolloverStatus.description:
Gets or sets the key rollover status which indicates if key rollover is required or not.
            If secrets encryption has been upgraded, then it requires key rollover.

storageDomainId.description: Gets or sets the storage domain id.

backupScheduleGroupId.description: Gets or sets the backup policy id.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of the file server
Gets or sets description for file share

adminUser.description:
Gets or sets user/group who will have full permission in this share
            Active directory email address. Example: xyz@microsoft.com or Fareast\xyz
            Create and Read only field.

provisionedCapacityInBytes.description: Gets or sets total provisioned capacity in Bytes

usedCapacityInBytes.description:
Gets or sets used capacity in Bytes
            Read only

localUsedCapacityInBytes.description:
Gets or sets used capacity in Bytes
            Read only

tieringThresholdInBytes.description:
Gets or sets tiering threshold in Bytes
            Portal will have slider to select this percentage (not supported in v1)

IPConfig.description: Class containing details related to the IP address configuration

ipAddress.description: Gets or sets the ipaddress of the network adapter.

prefixLength.description: Gets or sets the prefix length of the network adapter.

gateway.description: Gets or sets the gateway of the network adapter.

ipConfigStatus.description: Gets or sets the ipconfig status of the network adapter.

diskStatus.description: Gets or sets the disk status.

accessControlRecords.description: Gets or sets the access control records.

dataPolicy.description: Gets or sets the data policy.

provisionedCapacityInBytes.description: Gets or sets the provisioned capacity in bytes.

usedCapacityInBytes.description: Gets or sets the used capacity in bytes.

localCapacityInBytes.description: Gets or sets the local capacity in bytes.

tieringThresholdInBytes.description: Gets or sets the tiering threshold in bytes.

storageDomainId.description: Gets or sets the storage domain id.

backupScheduleGroupId.description: Gets or sets the backup policy id.

chapId.description: Gets or sets the chap id.

reverseChapId.description: Gets or sets the reverse chap id.

startTime.description: UTC time at which the job was started

endTime.description: UTC time at which the job completed

percentComplete.description: percentage of the job that is already complete

JobErrorDetails.description: The job error information containing List of JobErrorItem.

code.description: The code intended for programmatic access

message.description: The message intended to describe the error in detail

code.description: The code intended for programmatic access

message.description: The message intended to describe the error in detail

JobFilter.description: Filters that can be specified for the job

targetId.description: Id of the object that is created by the job

deviceId.description: deviceId in which the job is currently running

isCancellable.description: represents whether the job is cancellable or not

JobStage.description: Contains details about the multiple job stages of a job

JobStats.description: Stats that are available for all jobs in common

activationKey.description: Gets or sets the activation key for Series-9000 device

properties.description: List of properties of the Manager

XML Serialized string containing the following properties:
            Algorithm, ChannelEncryptionKey, ChannelIntegrationKey,Version

ManagerExtendedInfoProperties.description: Contains properties of the ManagerExtendedInfo object

version.description: Represents the version of the ExtendedInfo object being persisted

integrityKey.description: Represents the CIK of the resource

encryptionKey.description: Represents the CEK of the resource

encryptionKeyThumbprint.description: Represents the Cert thumbprint that was used to encrypt the CEK

portalCertificateThumbprint.description:
Represents the thumbprint of the portal thumbprint which can be optionally
            used to encrypt the entire data before persisting in core services DB

algorithm.description:
Represents the encryption algorithm used to encrypt the other keys
            None - if EncryptionKey is saved in plain text format
            AlgorithmName - if encryption is used

ManagerIntrinsicSettings.description: Intrinsic settings which refers to the type of the Storsimple manager

type.description: Refers to the type of the StorSimple Manager

cisIntrinsicSettings.description: Specifies if the Manager is Garda or Helsinki

sku.description: Specifies the name of the sku

provisioningState.description:
Specifies the state of the resouce as it is getting provisioned
            Value of "Succeeded" means the Manager was successfully created

Managers.description: Model to represent a list of storsimple Managers under a particular resourceGroup

Managersku.description: Sku object which is part of the Manager

name.description: Refers to the sku name which should be "standard"

MetricAvailablity.description:
Metric availability specifies the time grain (aggregation interval or frequency) 
            and the retention period for that time grain

timeGrain.description: Get or sets the time grain, specifies the aggregation interval for the metric.

retention.description: Gets or set the retention period for the metric at the specified timegrain

timeStamp.description: Gets or sets the time when the metric data is fetched

sum.description:
Gets or sets the sum of all the samples available in the 
            given instance of time for the specific metric data

count.description:
Gets or sets the count of samples of the metric data available for
            the given instance

average.description: Gets or sets the average of all sample for the given instance

minimum.description: Gets or sets the minimum of all samples available

maximum.description: Gets or sets the maximum of all samples available

MetricDefinition.description: Monitoring metric definition represents the metadata of the metrics.

name.description: Gets or sets the metric name

unit.description: Gets or sets the metric unit

primaryAggregationType.description: Gets or sets the metric aggregation type

resourceId.description: Gets or sets metric source id

metricAvailabilities.description: Gets or sets the available metric granularities

dimensions.description: Gets or sets the supported dimensions

value.description: Gets or set the list of metric definition

MetricFilter.description: class representing the filters to be passed while fetching metrics

MetricName.description: Class represents the name of the metric

MetricNameFilter.description: Class representing the name filter to be passed while fetching metrics

resourceId.description: Gets or sets the id of metric source

startTime.description: Gets or sets the metric start time

endTime.description: Gets or sets the metric end time

timeGrain.description: Gets or sets the time grain, time grain indicates frequency of the metric data

primaryAggregation.description: Gets or sets the metric aggregation type

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the metrics

dimensions.description: Get or sets Metric dimension which indicates the source of the metric

unit.description: Gets or sets unit of the metric data

values.description: Gets or sets the metric data

NetworkAdapter.description: Represents a networkAdapter in a particular node.

networkAdapterName.description: Gets or sets the name of the network adapter.

iPv4Info.description: Gets or sets the ipv4configuration of the network adapter.

iPv6Info.description: Gets or sets the ipv6configuration of the network adapter.

dhcpStatus.description: Gets or sets the flag which represents state of DHCP.

linkSpeed.description: Gets or sets the speed of the network adapter.

NetworkSettings.description: Model to represent the NetworkSettings of a device

properties.description: Properties are encased in this object

NetworkSettingsProperties.description: Class containing the properties of NetworkSettings

primaryDNSServer.description: Gets or sets the Primary DNS server for the appliance

secondaryDNSServer.description: Gets or sets the secondary DNS server for the appliance

nodeNetworks.description: Gets or sets the NetworkAdapters under each node of the device.

NodeNetwork.description: Represents a single node in a device. In Helsinki VA, only 1 Node is present

networkAdapters.description: Gets or sets the list of network adapters in the node.

location.description: The Geo location of the Manager

SecuritySettings.description: Model to represent the SecuritySettings of a device

properties.description: Properties are encased in this object

SecuritySettingsProperties.description: Class containing the properties for SecuritySettings

encryptedDeviceAdminPassword.description:
Device administrator password as an encrypted string (encrypted using RSA PKCS #1) is used to log into the 
            local web UI of the device. Actual password could have at least 8 characters that are a combination of 
            uppercase, lowercase, numeric, and special characters

encryptionCertificateThumbprint.description: Public key thumbprint of the certificate used to encrypt the device admin password

SendTestAlertEmailRequest.description: request for sending test alert email

emailList.description: list of emails to send the test alerts

StorageAccountCredentialList.description: Collection of Storage account credential entities

cloudType.description: Gets or sets the cloud service provider

endPoint.description: Gets or sets the storage endpoint

login.description: Gets or sets the storage account login

location.description: Gets or set the storage account's geo location

enableSSL.description: Gets or sets whether SSL needs to enable or not

password.description: Gets or sets the storage account encrypted password

passwordEncrpyptionCertificateThumbprint.description: Gets or sets the storage account password encryption thumbprint

storageAccountCredentialIds.description: Gets or sets the storage account credentials.

encryptionKey.description: Gets or sets the encryption key.

compressionStatus.description: Gets or sets whether compression is "enabled" or "disabled".

encryptionStatus.description: Gets or sets whether encryption is "enabled" or "disabled".

sourceType.description: Gets or sets Support Package Source Type

customIncludeList.description: Gets or sets list of log categories

TimeSettings.description: Model to represent the TimeSettings of a device

properties.description: properties are encased in this object

TimeSettingsProperties.description: Class containing the properties of TimeSettings

timeZone.description: Gets or sets the timezone for Helsinki device.

primaryTimeServer.description: Gets or sets the primary time server for Helsinki device.

secondaryTimeServer.description: Gets or sets the secondary time server for Helsinki device.

UpdateInstallProgress.description: Class representing the progress during installation of updates

properties.description: Update properties are encased in this object

deviceVersion.description:
Gets or sets the current Device HCS version
            This property is retrieved from ApplianceInfo object's "DeviceHcsVersion" property

deviceLastScannedTime.description:
Gets or sets the time when the appliance did a MU scan
            The difference between LastDeviceScannedTime and LastCompletedScanJobTime is that the former is sent directly from the appliance
            whereas LastCompletedScanJobTime is computed from the service side using the Job."Stopped" field

regularUpdatesAvailable.description:
Set to true if regular updates were detected in MU for the current version of the device
            Service will set this flag based on whether the UpdateItemCollection returned as result of scan was null or not

rebootRequiredForInstall.description: Set to true if RegularUpdatesAvailable is true and if atleast one of the updateItems detected has IsRebootActuallyNeeded = true

totalItemsPendingForDownload.description: The total number of items pending for download

totalItemsPendingForInstall.description: The total number of items pending for install

status.description: Gets or sets the current update operation.

lastCompletedScanTime.description: Gets or sets the time when the last scan job was completed (success/cancelled/failed) on the appliance

lastCompletedDownloadJobTime.description: Gets or sets the time when the last Download job was completed (success/cancelled/failed) on the appliance

lastCompletedInstallJobTime.description: Gets or sets the time when the last Install job was completed (success/cancelled/failed) on the appliance

inProgressDownloadJobId.description: if a download is in progress, this field contains the JobId of that particular download job

inProgressInstallJobId.description: if an install is in progress, this field contains the JobId of that particular install job

inProgressScanStartedTime.description: Gets or sets the time when the currently running scan job (if any) started

inProgressDownloadJobStartedTime.description: Gets or sets the time when the currently running download job (if any) started

inProgressInstallJobStartedTime.description: Gets or sets the time when the currently running install job (if any) started
